Class RingROI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.ROIBase
      • org.eclipse.dataset.roi.RingROI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, INameable, IROI
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SectorROI

    public class RingROI
extends ROIBase
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for ring region of interest
